EmailTemplate.name: NPS Funding Declined Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: RapidAdvance - Satisfaction Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks for taking the time to apply for financing from RapidAdvance.
Even though we weren’t able to approve your application at this time, we’d still like to know more about your experience with us so we can improve in the future. Please let us know by filling out this quick survey:
How likely is it that you would recommend RapidAdvance to a friend or colleague?
We’ll keep your answers confidential and won’t share them with another company without your permission.
Sincerely,
The RapidAdvance Team
© 2016 RapidAdvance. All rights reserved.
4500 East West Highway, 6th Floor. Bethesda, MD 20814
